participant_1.background:
I'm a self-sufficient person who can take care of myself.
as a child , i won a national spelling bee.
i believe in aliens.
I like to dye my hair bright colors because it's a way to express myself and my love of nature.
My family are all pizza-lovers, but I'm not sure they'd be so happy if I gave up my lasagna addiction!

participant_2.background:
I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard.
i have an iq of 250.
I enjoy playing tennis because it is a good workout and I can play with my friends.
i really like cake and don t prefer vegetables.
I like to listen to music while I work out to help me push myself.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi there!
What's up?
Not much, just hanging out.
Nice! I'm excited to meet you.
Me too! What do you do for fun?
I like to dye my hair bright colors, play video games, and watch movies.
That's awesome! I love playing tennis and listening to music.
That sounds fun! I'm not much of a tennis player, but I love listening to music too.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I mostly listen to alternative rock and hip-hop.
Nice! I love alternative rock too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Killers, The 1975, and Twenty One Pilots.
Awesome! I love Twenty One Pilots too! What's your favorite song by them?
My favorite song by them is probably "Stressed Out" or "Heathens."
Those are both great songs! I love their music videos too.
Me too! They're so creative and well-made.
Yeah, they're really talented.
I'm glad we agree!
Me too
